title: Mission not updating!
body: For some reason, I do my missions but they're not updating, giving me progress or the actual reward. Is it just me and can someone help!? {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

replies.body: Is this about **all** missions, or do some update when some don't? Might be important to assess.

What Eye of Envy said. Kinda hard to know if something is working or not if I don't know what I'm looking for ^_^. 

Also, looks like you just changed your summoner icon recently. The missions state you need to have a Worlds Icon equipped.
ohhhhhh.... ok that makes more sense, thank you!
